task.en: I don't know how to render a video using iMovie. Please demonstrate for me. Export the video to the Documents folder.
task.zh: 我不知道怎么用iMovie导出视频。请帮我演示怎么操作。把视频导出到Documents文件夹。

pre_command: osascript -e 'quit app "iMovie"' && rm -rf "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" && cp -r "/Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" /Users/ec2-user/Movies/; osascript -e 'tell application "iMovie" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "f" using {control down, command down}'
grading_command: if find /Users/ec2-user/Documents -type f \( -name "*.mp4" -o -name "*.mov" \) | grep -q .; then echo True; else echo False; fi
